item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Adults are just obsolete children and the hell with them." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "I am proud to be an emotionalist." -- James Joyce

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Randall Jarrell
item.description: "Art is long, and critics are the insects of a day." -- Randall Jarrell

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by S. Morgenstern
item.description: "He was the mighty Fezzik, lover of rhymes, and you did not give up, no matter what." -- S. Morgenstern

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "You were sick, but now you're well again, and there's work to do." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is easy to live for others, everybody does. I call on you to live for yourself." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Be not the slave of your own past - plunge into the sublime seas, dive deep, and swim far, so you shall come back with new self-respect, with new power, and with an advanced experience that shall explain and overlook the old." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by bell hooks
item.description: "When we face pain in relationships our first response is often to sever bonds rather than to maintain commitment. " -- bell hooks

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Catherine Gilbert Murdock
item.description: "When you don't talk, there's a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said." -- Catherine Gilbert Murdock

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "What we wait around a lifetime for with one person, we can find in a moment with someone else." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Lev Grossman
item.description: "I got my heart's desire, and there my troubles began." -- Lev Grossman

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Sometimes, there is no harm in putting off a piece of work until another day." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Italo Calvino
item.description: "...Life is nothing but trading smells." -- Italo Calvino

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Love is the whole thing. We are only pieces." -- Rumi

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exuper
item.description: "A single event can awaken within us a stranger totally unknown to us. To live is to be slowly born." -- Antoine de Saint-Exuper

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "I am who I am and I have the need to be." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "What saves a man is to take a step. Then another step." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Pema Chodron
item.description: "The only reason we don't open our hearts and minds to other people is that they trigger confusion in us that we don't feel brave enough or sane enough to deal with. To the degree that we look clearly and compassionately at ourselves, we feel confident and fearless about looking into someone else's eyes. " -- Pema Chodron

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Paul Bowles
item.description: "...before there can be change there must be discontent." -- Paul Bowles

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Just like there's always time for pain, there's always time for healing." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by John Ruskin
item.description: "A man wrapped up in himself makes a very small parcel." -- John Ruskin

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "What happens when people open their hearts?"... "They get better." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "In every crowd are certain persons who seem just like the rest, yet they bear amazing messages." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Karen Horney
item.description: "If you want to be proud of yourself, then do things in which you can take pride" -- Karen Horney

item.title: Jetsettica add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "I guess I wouldn't believe in anything anymore if it weren't for my lucky astrology mood watch." -- Steve Martin
